gameDetails.name: Rajas of the Ganges: Snake Expansion
gameDetails.description:
New Special Tiles, contained in "Deutscher Spielepreis 2018 Goodie Box".

Contents: 4 province tiles "Shalimar Gardens" (1 per color)

Rules: Mix the tiles into the corresponding snake stack. To acquire one of these tiles, you have to carry out a building action, as usual. The costs for one of these tiles are one die in the color of the tile with any number, plus any other die.

Each tile allows the player to take back one of his already-placed workers so he gets an extra turn this round.
